definition: to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
(onom.) whoosh
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.chinese: 在一家酒吧的殴斗中被刺杀。

sentences.english: The assassination gave rise to a sudden change in the election.
sentences.chinese: 刺杀事件使得大选的形势发生了陡变。

sentences.english: Federal authorities are now saying a possible assassination plot against Barack Obama posed no credible threat.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府称可能对奥巴马的刺杀阴谋只是一场虚惊。

sentences.english: The witches are deadly nurses and Banquo is assassinated by handgun and silencer.
sentences.chinese: 女巫成了致命的护士，而班柯被消音手枪刺杀。

sentences.english: Yano assassination failure not only, also fell into the trap set keyboards.
sentences.chinese: 矢野不但刺杀失败，还陷入了李剑布下的陷阱。

sentences.english: These were professional killers who 'did in' the president.
sentences.chinese: 刺杀总统的是职业杀手。

sentences.english: Who was shot at Ford's Theater, Washington, D. C. in 1865?
sentences.chinese: 谁于1865年被刺杀于华盛顿的福特剧院？

sentences.english: Lee Harvey Oswald, suspected of assassinating the president, was arrested.
sentences.chinese: 李哈维奥斯瓦德为刺杀疑犯被捕。

sentences.english: The incident began after a stabbing was reported at the all-day event.
sentences.chinese: 这件事情发生在“每日大事”报道刺杀事件之后。

sentences.english: Perform an Air Assassination on Tarik.
It commemorates the assassination of Iranian professor Ayatollah Morteza Motahhari.
sentences.chinese: 它是为了纪念刺杀伊朗教授阿亚图拉莫尔塔扎。

sentences.english: The spear is one kind has the long handle's assassination weapon.
sentences.chinese: 矛是一种具有长柄的刺杀兵器。

sentences.english: They assassinated the ((Union)) Vice President at the mine.
sentences.chinese: 他们在矿区刺杀了工会副主席。

sentences.english: The president of Ingushetia was severely wounded in an apparent assassination attempt on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 在周一的刺杀事件中，印古什共和国总统身受重伤。

sentences.english: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.
sentences.chinese: 借他的灵使天有妆饰，他的手刺杀快蛇。

sentences.english: There was a deep plot to assassinate the leader.
sentences.chinese: 有个刺杀领导人的老谋深算的密谋。
